channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:37 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Myrivska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover!
item.description: 游댮 09:37 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Myrivska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover! #Myrivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
